Ingredients.4: 1 clove garlic, or more to taste

Ingredients.6: 4 tablespoons extra-virgin olive oil, plus more as needed

Directions.1: Wash and dry borage leaves. Roast pumpkin seeds in a dry skillet until lightly browned, 2 to 4 minutes. Remove and allow to cool.

Directions.2: Combine borage leaves, roasted pumpkin seeds, Parmesan cheese, garlic, and salt in a food processor. With the food processor running, add olive oil, and process until a smooth paste forms. Transfer to a jar and add more olive oil to cover. Store in the refrigerator.
